body: #Microsoft to Report Q2 #Earnings: What's in the Cards? $MSFT Also $AAPL $DELL $ZM https://talkmarkets.com/content/stocks--equities/microsoft-to-report-q2-earnings-whats-in-the-cards?post=342062

links.title: Microsoft to Report Q2 Earnings: What's in the Cards?
links.description: Microsoft ( MSFT - Free Report) is set to report second-quarter fiscal 2022 results on Jan 25. The Zacks Consensus Estimate for revenues is pegged at $50.32 billion, implying growth of 16.82% from the figure reported in the year-ago quarter.

body:
$AAPL 

Apple only dropped a fraction compared to the others. If the earnings on 26 are ‘ok’. Apple will be a value/safe stock. Complaints about Apple not being a growth stock will work to its advantage. It will be a place to put money for safety. 

As much as WFH may be ending, the die has been cast. Compared to 2 years ago, a vast majority will still WFH and work remote. Even if the offices start to fill up again. 

Apples VR headset, my gamble guess bet is it will be a work from home virtual device. While the other headsets focus on gaming and metaverse. Apple could pull a hat trick and pitch a productivity tool. 

My two cents.
$AAPL blocked for ignorance .
